name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Dungeon Escape (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Haoyang Liu and Ariana Zhou

Dungeon Escape is a single-player, bullet hell style escape game. The player must dodge the boss's attacks while collecting items in order to escape through the door.

Move:  up, down, left, right arrow keys

(hold shift to move more slowly)
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
